name: Monkey.D.Garp
text: On Play: You may trash 1 card from your hand. Play up to 1 blue (Navy) Character card with a power of 8000 or less other than [Monkey.D.Garp] from your hand.

effect.text: You may trash 1 card from your hand. Play up to 1 blue (Navy) Character card with a power of 8000 or less other than [Monkey.D.Garp] from your hand.
